shorts.title: LOCAL COLLEGE: Scranton women’s soccer starts 2-0
shorts.title_distilled: LOCAL COLLEGE: Scranton women’s soccer starts 2-0.
shorts.description: Four players had goals as the University of Scranton women’s soccer team blanked Kean University, 4-0, in a nonconference game Saturday in Galloway, New Jersey. Jenna Borelli, Lena Madjor, Faith Sullivan and Addison Van Lenten scored for the Royals (2-0), who are ranked No. 13 in NCAA Division III. Alfred State 13, Keystone 0: At Alfred, New York, Maddie Mark had a hat trick and added an assist as Alfred State spoiled Keystone College’s season opener. Men’s soccer At La Plume, Lenskey Raoul netted the first two goals of his collegiate career and added an assist as Keystone College won […]
shorts.content: Four players had goals as the University of Scranton women’s soccer team blanked Kean University, 4-0, in a nonconference game Saturday in Galloway, New Jersey. Jenna Borelli, Lena Madjor, Faith Sullivan and Addison Van Lenten scored for the Royals (2-0), who are ranked No. 13 in NCAA Division III. Alfred State 13, Keystone 0: At Alfred, New York, Maddie Mark had a hat trick and added an assist as Alfred State spoiled Keystone College’s season opener. Men’s soccer At La Plume, Lenskey Raoul netted the first two goals of his collegiate career and added an assist as Keystone College won […]
shorts.content_distilled: Four players had goals as the University of Scranton women’s soccer team blanked Kean University, 4-0, in a nonconference game Saturday in Galloway, New Jersey.

shorts.title: Chris Kelly Opinion: Arsonists and empty assurances
shorts.title_distilled: Chris Kelly Opinion: Arsonists and empty assurances.
shorts.description: Some conflicts of interest are obvious and easily exposed to public scrutiny. A paroled arsonist, for instance, shouldn’t be trusted to start a “new career” as a firefighter or an insurance adjuster. Other questionable connections are more subtle and require some digging to bring to light. A state senator, for instance, should be asked whether a legislator has any business crafting laws that could benefit a businessman the legislator is in business with. So I called Sen. Marty Flynn, D-22, Dunmore, to ask about his financial interest in AM 421 Real Estate LLC. State corporation records list Alpesh “Al” Patel […]
shorts.content: Some conflicts of interest are obvious and easily exposed to public scrutiny. A paroled arsonist, for instance, shouldn’t be trusted to start a “new career” as a firefighter or an insurance adjuster. Other questionable connections are more subtle and require some digging to bring to light. A state senator, for instance, should be asked whether a legislator has any business crafting laws that could benefit a businessman the legislator is in business with. So I called Sen. Marty Flynn, D-22, Dunmore, to ask about his financial interest in AM 421 Real Estate LLC. State corporation records list Alpesh “Al” Patel […]
shorts.content_distilled: Some conflicts of interest are obvious and easily exposed to public scrutiny.
